result.arabic_text: قُلِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ وَسَلَٰمٌ عَلَىٰ عِبَادِهِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱصۡطَفَىٰٓۗ ءَآللَّهُ خَيۡرٌ أَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ
result.translation: (Yaa Muhammad) Jedhi: “Faaruun hundi kan Rabbiiti,  nageenyi gabroota Isaa kan [Inni] filate irra haa jiraatu, Sila Rabbi moo wantoota isaan [Isatti] qindeessantu caala?”
